caption:
🍫🔥 Jet-Puffed S’mores Ice Cream Sandwiches🍦Toasted or not, these are a must for your dessert lineup!

Ingredients (Makes 6 sandwiches):
12 graham cracker squares
½ cup Jet-Puffed Marshmallow Creme
2 cups ice cream of your choice
1 cup semi sweet chocolate chips or melting chocolate

Instructions:
1. Line a small baking sheet or shallow pan with parchment paper. Spread the ice cream into a flat, even layer about ½  inch thick. Freeze until firm, at least 30 minutes.
2. Spread a generous layer of Jet-Puffed Marshmallow Creme onto one side of each graham cracker. Optional: For a toasted touch, lightly toast the creme with a kitchen torch or broiler.
3. Once frozen, cut the ice cream into squares the size of your graham crackers.Sandwich each ice cream square between two marshmallow-covered grahams, sticky sides facing in.
4. Melt chocolate chips in 30-second intervals in the microwave, stirring until smooth. Drizzle or dip the tops of the sandwiches with chocolate.
5. Place the assembled sandwiches on a parchment-lined tray and freeze for at least 1 hour, or until ready to serve. Then, pull from the freezer and serve immediately for the ultimate frozen s’mores treat!
